windows.title: TailorKey v4.2h
windows.notes:
üßøTK42h: https://sites.google.com/view/tailorkey
TailorKey is a zero-code layout for the Glove80, inspired by Sunaku‚Äôs Glorious Engrammer and created for the default QWERTY keycap layout. It‚Äôs easily adjustable, free from Custom Defined Behaviors, and includes:
‚Ä¢ Home-row modifiers (HRM)
‚Ä¢ Autoshift
‚Ä¢ Symbol, Cursor, and Gaming Layers
‚Ä¢ Advanced Mouse Emulation
‚Ä¢ Combo Keys

TailorKey leverages the Layout Editor‚Äôs powerful built-in (native) functions, enabling easy customization, or allows you to simply copy its capabilities to craft your own unique layout‚Äîall without relying on Custom-Defined Behaviors.

üñ±Ô∏èMouse Emulation
Enable mouse emulation by turning on the HID_POINTING option under Advanced Configuration.
If you‚Äôre using mouse emulation for the first time, unpair the keyboard from all host computers and then re-pair it.

This zero-code layout is developed by @moosy. More information is available on https://sites.google.com/view/tailorkey
TailorKey is inspired by the fully featured Glorious Engrammer, developed by @sunaku. Please see https://github.com/sunaku/glove80-keymaps/releases for the Glorious Engrammer layout.

üí° Tip: Want to use only part of this layout (like Home-Row Mods or AutoShift)? Just copy the relevant layer‚Äîits associated macros and hold-tap actions will be included automatically.
üì∫ See how it's done here:  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=m72eTAEUWho
